statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{x^{3} + 12 \, x^{2} - 12 \, x - 11 , 4 \, x^{3} - 4 \, x^{2} + 2 \, x - 2 , 3 \, x^{3} + 4 \, x^{2} - 5 \, x - 3 , 5 \, x^{3} - 4 \, x^{2} + 2 \, x + 5 , 5 \, x^{3} - 4 \, x^{2} + 2 \, x + 5\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
